column2: These third-party vendors will have access to the information needed to perform their functions, but may not use your information for any other purpose.

The Smithsonian requires credit card processing be secured based on compliance with Payment Card Industry (PCI) standards. When you use your credit card for any purchase on a Smithsonian Website, that transaction is always encrypted when traveling over the Internet.
